朋友们好啊，我是无能狂怒守尸门掌门人，天龙巴布。刚才有个朋友问我说，哎巴老师发生甚么事了，我说怎么回事，给我发了几张截图，我一看！奥！原来是佐田，有两个年轻人，绿段左右，一个肝帝90多级，一个肝帝80多级，他们说，哎…有一个说是我在哈登练回头贴膜，颈椎练坏了，巴老师你能不能教教我守尸舞步，哎…帮助治疗一下，我的颈椎病，我说可以。我说你在哈登练死劲儿不好用，他不服气。我说小朋友：你一个钢筋来躲我一个拉锯，他躲不过。他说你这也没用我说我这个有用，这是策划，传统策划是讲无脑的千金拨四两。二百多斤的果体大卫，都躲不过我这一个拉锯，啊…哈！他非和我试手，我说可以。诶…我一说呢啪就站起来了，很快啊！然后上来就是一个砸板一个爆柜一个闪光弹，我全部防出去，防出去了啊！防出去以后，自然是传统功夫以点到为止，锤子放到他鼻子上没打他，我笑一下准备收锤，由于这时间，按传统功夫的点到为止他已经输了，如果这一锤发力，一锤就把他李宁给撬开线了。放在他鼻子上没有打他，他承认，我先打到他面部。他不知道锤放在他鼻子上，他也承认，我先打到他面部。啊，我收锤的时间不打了，他突然袭击来照我脸，我大意了啊，没有闪，哎…他的手电给我眼，啊，右眼，闪了一下，但没关系啊！他也说，啊他截图也说了，两分多钟以后，当时流眼泪了，捂着眼，我说婷婷。然后两分多钟以后，两分多钟以后，诶就好了。我说，小伙子，你不讲武德，你不懂。他说，巴老师对不起，对不起，我不懂规矩。啊，我是…他说他是乱照的，他可不是乱照的啊！绿电池，红灯泡，紫手电，训练有素，后来他说他练过五百小时的Timing。啊，看来是有bear来！这两个年轻人不讲武德，来骗！来偷袭！我这一十九岁的小巴布，这好吗？这不好。我劝这位年轻人好自为之，好好反思，以后不要再犯这样的聪明，小聪明啊！杀机要以和为贵，要讲武德，不要搞窝里斗，谢谢朋友们！

This could be a fun coop game, but if you play with 'git gud' mentality. you're ruining the others :c

+ To be able to playing with your prey is fun ;)
To be able to kill innocent people is fun ;)
+ To annoy the hunter is fun ;)
To coop with teammate in desperate moments is fun ;)

To "GG EZ"-ed from other side is not fun if you're the one being targeted :c
To get targeted killed [AKA tunneled?] is not fun (if you're survivor) especially in early round
To get looped and emoted is not fun (if you're killer) especially if it's done for long time

 Overall : it's a good guilty pleasure game (if you got into good gaming moments)
 Oh Developer tend to bring new killer/survivor for its gamer. so yeah, this game is great :/

Super fun asymmetrical horror game, though balance can be a little more favored toward the survivors the game is still a blast, so long as you don't take the game super seriously.

I wish I could get a refund on this game, even if the refund went to PETA instead of me, because that's how undeserving this developer is of money. 

If you why this game with so much potential sucks and always will suck:
First go watch Scott Jund's 7.0 path notes which were universally praised as the kinda of changes that would make this game fun.

Then go watch a developer react to Scott's video by getting all butt-hurt that someone would dare challenge their choices, and responding with what basically amounts to ad-hominems.

Realize how out of touch the dev's are with their own community, the state of their game, and that they only care about the bottom line so not only are they not ever going to fix the glaring game-play issues they are going to continue to introduce new bugs faster than they fix the existing bugs.

Realize that the player base consist of mainly of people who are addicted, people who so obsessed with horror IP's that they'll accept a 7th rate horror experience so long as the dude from scream is in it, people who enjoy being toxic and cheaters.

Realize that things will never change, because a majority of the player base will continue to buy burning garbage, because a majority of them self respect. And the fact the humans are capable of such a low levels self respect is an indictment of what a failure the species is, that it's most likely doomed to extinction and none of this crap matters. 

Go play civilization. 


OLD Review
*****Do I enjoy this game yes, Would I recommend this game no. The only reason I enjoy this game is because I have a group to play  the custom game mode with. This game has potential but there are so many game wrecking problems with simple solutions, and the fact that none of them have been really addressed is telling about the developer.

The biggest problem is all the time wasting. Because the developer has not taken the basic step of incentivizing people to que into role that is under played at the moment, or even bothered to give you a way of knowing. (apparently they once had an option like this but they took it out because it was a good idea)

This results in you often having to wait 15 for a game if you want to have a choice of what you're playing. 
Then 80-90% of the time you get one of the following three game types. A group rank 4-13 survivors vs a rank 19 killer. A group of rank 18 survivors vs a rank 4-13 killer. A game that is evenly matched but one of the survivors rage quits or suicides and ruins it for everyone else.  

The game can be really fun when it balanced, how ever if your playing with randos on the internet it's often 1-2 hours of waiting and frustration for 10-15 minutes of fun.****
While an extremely interesting and fun game, its best to avoid the postgame chat as it is around 80% pure toxicity

所有喜爱世界级电竞的中国玩家们，只要喜爱跨服对战的都是世界级电竞的中国玩家。都考虑一下吧，我们不缺胳膊不缺腿都是正常人，为什么要年年格外支付一笔加速器的费用？都什么年代了？电子游戏不只是有钱人享受的东西，男女老少人人都在玩，就像看电视一样。这也不是爱国的问题，有些人被国家骗，有些人给国家干活，拿不到正常钱，还被政府收割，不管是有情还是无情，这个问题跟爱国问题一点关系没有。事实就是我们国家大部分正常人消费水平高，收入水平低，大部分都是正常人！凭什么年年要多出一部分加速器费用？这笔费用得让政府给我们出！！！玩游戏就像看电视一样，得年年出！！！大部分正常的中国人一天干活累的要死，回家就为了玩会儿游戏，跨服就得多支付钱啊？政府收割的不够？凭什么玩游戏开加速器还要年年多支付一笔钱！！！所以，中国政府想管控就管控，想核审就核审，想出国服就出国服！但是中国人是讲理的，代价就一个，以后玩游戏加速器的费用必须都由中国政府承包了！他们独裁收了那么多年的好处，也该由他们承包这笔费用了吧

Edit: esse jogo tá cada vez mais mais bugado, com cada atualização. Eu tô de saco cheio. Jogue no lixo. 

Esse jogo me traz um grande dilema: tem um potencial incrível para ser divertidíssimo - e muitas vezes é -, mas consegue também ser uma das experiências mais frustrantes da sua vida.

Do lado positivo, há uma grande variedade de assassinos com poderes únicos com os quais você pode ter maior ou menor afinidade (eu, por exemplo, adoro jogar com a porca e me frustro com o canibal). Os sobreviventes são igualmente variados. Não possuem nenhuma diferença estrutural entre si, mas oferecem diversas skins e vantagens, que também são bem variadas e permitem diferentes estilos de jogo, que torna a experiência "fresca", se você estiver disposto a tentar novas coisas.

Do lado negativo, o jogo possui diversos bugs, que são renovados com cada atualização. Você consegue ficar preso em pedras, paredes e todo tipo de coisa entre uma atualização e outra... e isso é frustrante.
O sistema de balanceamento do jogo também não merece elogios. Como assassino, você se deparará com pessoas muito mais experientes do que você e como sobrevivente, toda sorte de companheiro, daqueles que parecem que começaram ontem àqueles que viram o jogo nascer. E boa sorte em sobreviver em meio a isso.

Por fim, o fator humano é algo complexo. A competitividade consegue expulsar das entranhas à pele o pior que o ser humano pode oferecer. Sobreviventes abusam de mecânicas não intencionais na sua cara. Assassinos lutam para "expulsar" uma pessoa do jogo o quanto antes para manter ou conquistar seu status: vale tudo para tentar ganhar.

A sensação que tenho é de que o que importa ao outro é impor sua frustração aos demais, como único consolo. E aí temos esse ambiente desagradável pelo qual este jogo é conhecido.

Ainda assim, recomendaria este jogo: mas tente não jogar a sério e, preferencialmente, jogue com amigos.
